data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Olimpico have now been confirmed.
The match has started, with Fiorentina kicking-off.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Roma.
Daniele Chiffi blows against Roma's Leonardo Spinazzola for offside.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Olimpico.
Daniele Chiffi awards the away team a throw-in.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
In the minute 5, Daniele Chiffi signals a Roma throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Fiorentina's area.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Roma.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Roma.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 12, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Free kick Roma.
In Rome, Aleksandar Kolarov of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 19, Roma have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Amadou Diawara of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Federico Chiesa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 24, Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma's Edin Dzeko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
In the minute 26, Pol Lirola (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Roma to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 30, Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Roma pushes forward through Lorenzo Pellegrini, whose finish on goal is saved.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In the minute 33, Daniele Chiffi signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Roma's half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Roma.
In the minute 34, German Pezzella is booked for the away team.
Roma push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Lorenzo Pellegrini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
Can Roma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 36, Attention is being given to Fiorentinaâ€™s Christian Kouame and play has been suspended briefly.
Christian Kouame has recovered and rejoins the match in Rome.
Roma are pushing forward but Edin Dzeko's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Rachid Ghezzal of Fiorentina is pulled up for offside.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 41, Roma drive upfield and Leonardo Spinazzola gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Gianluca Mancini for Roma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 42, Daniele Chiffi awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Olimpico.
An attacking Roma player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 45, Fiorentina's German Pezzella is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Roma capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Rome Roma's Gianluca Mancini is caught offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Jordan Veretout nets and Roma now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
The second half is underway in Rome - Roma with the kick-off.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Roma.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Christian Kouame with Dusan Vlahovic.
Giuseppe Iachini is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Patrick Cutrone replacing Franck Ribery.
Alfred Duncan (Fiorentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
In the minute 49, Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 51, Roma needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Edin Dzeko (Roma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In the minute 54, Important block from the Roma defence as Dusan Vlahovic fires in a strike for Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Nikola Milenkovic.
In the minute 54, That's a fine assist from Erick Pulgar.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Roma.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Daniele Chiffi signals a Roma throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 58, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rome to check on Lorenzo Pellegrini, who is grimacing with pain.
Nicolo Zaniolo (Roma) has replaced the possibly injured Lorenzo Pellegrini at Stadio Olimpico.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
In the minute 61, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Roma in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Roma in the half of Fiorentina.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roma are on the attack at Stadio Olimpico, where Henrikh Mkhitaryan is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 66, Important block from the Roma defence as Dusan Vlahovic fires in a strike for Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Patrick Cutrone for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 67, Edin Dzeko (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Roma.
Nicolo Zaniolo of Roma smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Roma.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Roma are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 72, Fiorentina's Martin Caceres has been booked in Rome.
Jordan Veretout of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Daniele Chiffi awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Roma to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma make their second substitution with Bryan Cristante replacing Amadou Diawara.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Edin Dzeko's header is off-target for Roma.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Alfred Duncan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Roma have been awarded a corner by Daniele Chiffi.
Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Rome.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a third substitution, with Carles Perez replacing Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
In the minute 82, Lorenzo Venuti is replacing Federico Chiesa for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Roma's Edin Dzeko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Roma.
Roma have been given a penalty at Stadio Olimpico...
In the minute 85, Aleksandar Kolarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Rachid Ghezzal for Fiorentina has been booked by Daniele Chiffi and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Roma take a 2-1 lead thanks to a Jordan Veretout spot-kick..
Daniele Chiffi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Rome.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
In Rome, Nicolo Zaniolo of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Roma just outside Fiorentina's area.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Fiorentina.
Fiorentina drive upfield and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Roma defender.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Daniele Chiffi signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Roma needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
At Stadio Olimpico, Nikola Milenkovic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Gianluca Mancini (Roma) gets a yellow card.
